name: Adarsh Salve
title: Software Developer
objective: Aspiring software developer seeking to join Google's Software Application Development Apprenticeship to apply my skills in Java and Python while gaining hands-on experience in coding, development, and testing.

projects.name: MERN Rumala Sahib Store E-commerce Website and Admin Panel
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive E-commerce website for Rumala Sahib Store using MERN Stack. Designed and implemented a custom admin panel to enable client-side content management.

projects.name: React.js Inventory Management System with Data Forecasting
projects.description: Built an inventory management system integrated with demand forecasting using React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Flask, and Python.

projects.name: React.js Aaryan Devcon Pvt Ltd Website and Admin Panel
projects.description: Designed and developed the official website for Aaryan Devcon Pvt Ltd, incorporating React.js for a seamless user experience. Developed a custom admin panel and API for frontend content management.

education.institution: Konkan Gyanpeeth College of Engineering, Karjat (Mumbai University)

responsibilities: Developed and maintained websites, ensuring responsiveness and cross-browser compatibility.
Optimized website performance, resulting in a 20% increase in page load speed.
Developed a user-friendly responsive E-commerce website using CSS and JavaScript.

certifications.name: Introduction to Web Development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript
